content: Transit franchise expense was up 19% due to higher revenues on majority of our contracts, which are in their revenue shares, but also due to the higher MAG owed to the MTA from our 2020 deferral and inflation increased for 2022 in accordance with the terms of our MTA contract, Posting, maintenance and other expense was essentially flat versus the prior year as increases related to higher business activity were offset by decreases in production expense for specialty campaigns.
